title: Fukui Prefectural School for the Deaf
data: Fukui Prefectural School for the Deaf (福井県立ろう学校, Fukui-kenritsu-rō-gakkō) is a school for the deaf located in Fukui, Fukui Prefecture, Japan. The school educates children in regular school subjects from infant age through high school. This Japan school-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
